attributes.action: Stop ABA Therapy and ban it from being used in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
If the Government were to debate this petition, i would absolutely love it because it would stop children and adults with Autism being taught how to act normal in society because why would someone with such a lovely condition want to be tret like an animal!?! 
Please can you stop this harmful therapy please, im begging you, please please sign and share so we can stop this disgusting and vile therapy!!
attributes.background: I want parliament to put a stop to the horrible Therapy as it treats people with Autism like dogs and i, as an autistic person, would hate this and i do not support this therapy at all!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578616
